2. Pregnancy Induced Hypertension
 ∙ PIH includes:
 ¾ Hypertension—systolic blood pressure of 140 mmHg or more and/or diastolic blood pressure of 90 
mmHg or more, on two consecutive readings taken four hours or more a part.
 ¾ Pre-eclampsia—hypertension with proteinuria
 ¾ Eclampsia—hypertension with proteinuria and convulsions
